verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, Thou Almighty King. newline Help us Thy name to sing. newline Help us to praise. newline Father, all glorious, newline O'er all victorious. newline Come and reign over us, newline Ancient of Days.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come, Thou Incarnate Word, newline Gird on Thy mighty sword, newline Our prayer attend. newline Come, and Thy people bless, newline And give Thy Word success. newline Spirit of holiness, newline On us descend.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come, Holy Comforter, newline Thy sacred witness bear newline In this glad hour. newline Thou who almighty art, newline Now rule in every heart; newline And ne'er from us depart, newline Spirit of power.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: To the great One in Three newline Eternal praises be newline Hence evermore. newline His sovereign majesty newline May we in glory see, newline And to eternity newline Love and adore.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O Lord, our God, to Thee newline The highest praises be, newline Hence, evermore; newline Thy sov'reign majesty newline May we in glory see, newline And to eternity newline Love and adore.
